matadrs.mat_tools.libAutoPipeline module¶

This file is part of the Matisse pipeline GUI series Copyright (C) 2017- Observatoire de la Côte d’Azur

Created in 2016 @author: pbe, fmillour, ame

Automatic MATISSE pipeline library !

Please contact florentin.millour@oca.eu for any question

This software is a computer program whose purpose is to show oifits files from the MATISSE instrument.
